DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct China . The aim trial evaluate clinical efficacy turoctocog alfa treatment bleed episode Chinese patient severe haemophilia A ( FVIII≤1 % ) .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Turoctocog Alfa Prophylaxis Treatment Bleeding Episodes Previously Treated Chinese Patients With Haemophilia A
DOC.criteria: Male patient Age 0 year With diagnosis severe congenital haemophilia A ( FVIII≤1 % ) History exposure day ( ED ) FVIII product fulfil criterion previously treat patient : Patients 12 year : 100 exposure day ( ED ) Patients 12 year : 50 exposure day ( ED ) Inhibitors factor VIII ( ≥0.6 BU ) screen assessed central laboratory Known history FVIII inhibitor
